certifications.title: Complete Machine Learning and Data Science Bootcamp Certificate

projects.name: Data Augmentation for Cancer Detection
projects.description: Utilized Neural Style Transfer to improve classification accuracy of pathology slides depicting cancer. Integrated the VGG16 model for data augmentation and enhanced cancer detection by around 18%. Implemented an ensemble learning approach to enhance model robustness, resulting in improved accuracy.

projects.name: TuneTales
projects.description: Formulated a personalized blog facilitating musical connections, resulting in a vibrant online community. Analyzed user engagement metrics, including daily active users (DAU) and a 43% increase in user retention. Incorporated user feedback to iterate on features, resulting in a 28% increase in user satisfaction metrics.

projects.name: Intel OneAPI Telecom Churn Prediction
projects.description: Implemented Random Over-Sampler to balance distribution, boosting performance by 87% in precision. Orchestrated seamless deployment of churn prediction model using Flask, reducing churn rate by 77% on average. Conducted user feedback surveys leading to a 19% increase in customer retention and 7% revenue improvement.

experiences.description: Worked on UI/UX design and Front-end development projects. Optimized front-end codebase, cutting page load times by 37% across 3 Eucto website projects. Designed UIs for 3 client projects, boosting user engagement by 23% and User Experience. Collaborated with cross-functional teams on 2 major feature releases, increasing user satisfaction scores by 17%.

Spearheaded the development of Techeigens social media-like application for the learning community. Achieved a 27% increase in user engagement through intuitive functionalities to retain a broader user base. Drove strategic planning initiatives as a core team member and a 33% increase in user retention rates.
